Special Experiences Old and New Delhi Join a morning yoga session in the Lodhi Gardens before heading out into the hustle and bustle of Old Delhi and New Delhi. Sunrise at the Taj Mahal Witness the iconic Taj Mahal blush in the glow of dawn, a moment of breathtaking beauty. Lunch at ‘Sheroes Café’ Share a meal and heartfelt stories with incredible women who are survivors of acid attacks, working to challenge societal norms.
